alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:26AM CDT until July 23 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Whiteside County in northwestern Illinois... Northeastern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... Northwestern Bureau County in north central Illinois... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 525 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Leon Corners, or 14 miles south of Morrison, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sterling, Rock Falls, Prophetstown, Sheffield, Tampico, Lyndon, Buda, Deer Grove, Emerson, Neponset, Yorktown, Round Grove, Manlius, Mineral, New Bedford, Portland Corners, Como, Denrock, Douglas Park and Agnew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
